Posts.Content: Jun 17, 2007 07:50PM laureniris wrote: When in doubt, please get MRIs. I had 3 tumors (each around 1.2 cm) missed by "best in NY" radiologists' yearly mammograms and ultrasounds. I think I really would have benefited from MRIs. Glad to have chosen bilateral mast. and not to be dealing with radiology right now.
Posts.Title: Cancer missed by mammogram? joanne_elizabeth HoneyBeaw
